{{knowledge objective

|Item_parent=Smoking addiction

|Rank=A
|Title=Knowing the epidemiology of smoking among pregnant women
|Description=Knowledge
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=10}}


* Pregnancy
** half of pregnant women continue to smoke during pregnancy
** more frequently among the youngest and least educated women

question.question: What is the prevalence of smoking among pregnant women?
question.option_a: More than 75% of pregnant women continue to smoke during pregnancy
question.option_b: Half of pregnant women continue to smoke during pregnancy, with a higher prevalence among the youngest and least educated women
question.option_c: Less than 25% of pregnant women smoke during pregnancy, with a lower prevalence among older and more educated women
question.option_d: Smoking prevalence among pregnant women is the same as the general population of women of childbearing age
